sentences.en: Generations of students have learnt to parrot the standard explanations.
sentences.cn: 一代又一代学生学会了机械地重复这些标准解释。

sentences.en: he is the only one who has dared raise his standard against her.
sentences.cn: 他是唯一敢起来反对她的人。

sentences.en: He says they mistakenly believed the standard licenses they held were sufficient.
sentences.cn: 他说他们曾经误以为有正规执照就足够了。

sentences.en: It carried off the Evening Standard drama award for best play.
sentences.cn: 它获得伦敦晚间标准戏剧奖的最佳戏剧奖。

sentences.en: Jones and Armstrong maintain a consistently high standard.
sentences.cn: 琼斯和阿姆斯特朗始终保持着高水准。

sentences.en: Plumbing and electrics are installed to a high standard.
sentences.cn: 管道设备和电路按照高标准安装。

sentences.en: Residents in general are poor and undereducated, and live in sub-standard housing.
sentences.cn: 居民们普遍都很贫穷，受教育程度低，居住条件较差。

sentences.en: Sometimes, that standard is quite difficult, if not impossible, to achieve.
sentences.cn: 有时即便有可能达到那个标准，那也是非常困难。

sentences.en: Standard 8mm projects at 16 frames per second.
sentences.cn: 标准的8毫米的胶片每秒放映16组镜头。

sentences.en: Standard examples were drummed into students' heads.
sentences.cn: 学生脑子里被灌输了各种标准的范例。

sentences.en: Students have to reach a certain standard or they won’t pass.
sentences.cn: 学生必须达到某一标准，否则无法通过。

sentences.en: The airline has rigorous safety standards.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司有严格的安全标准。

sentences.en: The format is fairly standard.
sentences.cn: 这个格式是比较标准的。

sentences.en: The London Evening Standard moved offices a few years ago.
sentences.cn: 《伦敦标准晚报》报址几年前迁走了。

sentences.en: The standard of education was abysmally low.
sentences.cn: 教育水平极低。

sentences.en: The standard of living today is on the edge of subsistence.
sentences.cn: 现在的生活水平几乎快要无法维持生计。

sentences.en: The standard spec includes stainless steel holding tanks.
sentences.cn: 标准配置里包含了不锈钢储液罐。

sentences.en: The W.H.O. safety standard for ozone levels is somewhere about a hundred.
sentences.cn: 世界卫生组织关于臭氧层的安全标准约为100。

sentences.en: Their relationship turned the standard notion of marriage on its head.
sentences.cn: 他们的关系完全颠覆了传统的婚姻观念。

sentences.en: We paid them the standard rate.
sentences.cn: 我们付给他们标准工资。

words.tran_cn: 标准的；标准化的；定型的
标准化；[数] 规格化；校准
使合乎标准；按标准校准；制定标准（standardize的过去分词）
使…符合标准；使…标准化；使…统一
[标准]标准的；合规格的；公认为优秀的

trans.tran_en: the level that is considered to be acceptable, or the level that someone or something has achieved
